From hong yie on forum - http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&p=153689#p153689.. .
When Ai is playing a spell that i also hold in my hand, the card animation will start from my hand, not from the AI's hand. doesn't really important, just for perfectionist. :)
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: AI appears to play a card from your hand!
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on June 06, 2014 13:38:41_

From hong yie on forum - http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&p=153689#p153689.. .
When Ai is playing a spell that i also hold in my hand, the card animation will start from my hand, not from the AI's hand. doesn't really important, just for perfectionist. :)
